import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button, Pagination, Switch, Checkbox, Select } from 'antd'; import IconFont from '../../../../iconfont/font' import './List.less'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import jiding from './img/mall-food-list-gongbao.jpg' // ----------------- redux ---------- import * as actionCreators from '../../../../redux/actions/actions'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { bindActionCreators } from "redux" import { reject } from 'q'; const Option = Select.Option; class Temp extends Component { constructor() { super() this.Page = null //用于包装Pagination组件; this.state = { current: 1, storeData: [], // 菜品数据 categoryName: {} // 类名 } } async componentDidMount() { // 重复工作尽量用生命周期 await this.props.fetchFoodInfo() //!!!!!!! 终点请求数据异步,拿不到 let temp = [] let categoryName = {}//类名 for (let ele of this.props.data.data) { categoryName[ele.categoryName] = ele.categoryName//存储类名 for (let item of ele.spuList) {//对拿回来数据处理 item.categoryName = ele.categoryName //类名 temp.push(item) } } this.setState({ storeData: temp, categoryName }) } renderItems = (ele) => { //信息内容列表部分渲染; return ( < Checkbox /> {ele.spuId} {ele.spuName} {ele.categoryName} {ele.saleVolum} ￥{ele.currentPrice}

热销:

推荐:

折扣:

) } render() { let Items = null;//不能设为"" 初次渲染报错: tbody不能为空 if (this.state.storeData.length) {//拿到数据,是否进循环进行判断***难点**** // Object.prototype.toString.call(value) let { storeData: data } = this.state;//解构赋值 console.log(data) if (data.length === 1) { //只有一条数据,渲染条件,数据格式也在这里进行修改; //******** 查询后渲染结果不合格 bug重点！！！！！******* Items = data.data[0].UsersData.map(this.renderItems) } else { //完整数据,通过对页码判断 得到需要渲染数据 //按照数组类数据index进行筛选,按照id筛选导致删除后页面筛选有空 Items = data.filter((e, index) => index >= 5 * (this.state.current - 1) && index < 5 * this.state.current ).map(this.renderItems) if (!Items.length) { let temp = this.state.current * 1 this.setState({ current: temp - 1 }) return this.state } } } return (
{/* 员工信息组件 */}

< Checkbox /> 编号 菜品图片 菜品名称 菜品类型 销量 价格 标签 操作

) } } export default withRouter(connect( state => { return { data: state.foodData } },//将redux变量赋值到组件,成组件变量Data dispatch => bindActionCreators(actionCreators, dispatch))(Temp))
